name: Veangance Of Ulrezaj (Campaign Co-op)
description:
Veangance of Ulrezaj is a Starcraft 2 Wings of Liberty campaign co-op/singleplayer style map.

My Inspirations for designing this map was because there are so few decent campaign style co-op maps available and I wanted to go ahead and create the ultimate co-op style experiance. The one Iv'e always wanted to play.

This map is available in either co-op or singleplayer format(with an AI player controlling Player 2) Story: Jim Raynor has found the final piece of the artifact but someone else has beaten him to it. The Queen of Blades has arrived but that's the least of their problems. An all powerful dark archon threatens to consume them all.

Features:

\-Campaign Style mission in either a co-op or singleplayer format -All WOL campaign mode story tech unlocked -Multiple Difficulties -Levable Hero's who learn new abilities -Custom AI (AI hero's) -Gigantic Boss Fights -Unique game play mechanics -Cinematics

Check it out now on the NA server search for "Veangance of Ulrezaj."

Thanks and don't forget to rate!
author: _ForgeUser10641396
